name: sofar KTL-X request
info:
TCP modbus request for LSW3 wifi logger  
used with Sofar solar KTL-X inverters

### Outputs
1. JSON data
: payload (object | buffer | string) : parsed data object, raw buffer if can't decode data or error message.
: topic (string) : `decoded data` | `unknown data` | `unexpected data` | `error`.
: debug (object) : debug data object.
: error (object) : error object if there was an error in tcp request node

2. raw data
: payload (buffer) : raw data frames.
: topic (string) : `raw request` | `raw response`

### Details

Default logger port:  
`8899`

Logger SN:  
`17xxxxxxxx`

Default first register address in hex:  
`0x0000`

Default last register address in hex:  
`0x0027`

### References

 - [GitHub](https://github.com/serek4/node-red-sofar-ktl-x-request) - the node github repository
